name: libidn2
description: International domain name library (IDNA2008, Punycode and TR46)
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: Clear technical introduction with good reference links but lacks practical usage examples and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No code examples showing how to actually use the API functions (idn2_to_ascii_8z, idn2_to_unicode_8z8z) despite mentioning them

positive_signals: No open issues indicating unaddressed problems
